data.name: Spark in the Dark Demo
data.detailed_description:
Hello everyone!

We are glad to preset the demo of Spark in the Dark on Steam!

The exciting adventure into a dark Dungeon, ancient secrets, bloodthirsty creatures and deadly traps await you.

We look forward to your feedback!

data.short_description: Hello everyone! We are glad to preset the demo of Spark in the Dark on Steam! The exciting adventure into a dark Dungeon, ancient secrets, bloodthirsty creatures and deadly traps await you. We look forward to your feedback!

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages or for viewing at work: battles with monsters with a display of blood. Dead people and skeletons.
